mapper.select: select icategory,title,created_at createdat,board_view boardview from board where iuser = #{iuser} and del_yn = 1
select A.icategory,B.name,A.title,A.ctnt,A.created_at createdat,A.board_view boardview from board A inner join user B on A.iuser = B.iuser order by A.iboard desc limit #{startIdx},#{row}
SELECT COUNT(A.iboard) FROM ( SELECT x.iboard FROM board x INNER JOIN user y ON x.iuser = y.iuser WHERE x.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND x.del_yn = 1 ) A

select A.icategory,B.name,A.title,A.ctnt,A.created_at createdat,A.board_view boardview from board A inner join user B on A.iuser = B.iuser where A.icategory=#{icategory} order by A.iboard desc limit #{startIdx},#{row}

select A.iboard, C.name category, A.title, B.name, A.created_at createdat, A.board_view boardview from board A inner join user B on A.iuser = B.iuser inner join board_category C on A.icategory = C.icategory where A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and A.del_yn = 1 order by A.iboard desc limit #{startIdx},#{row}

SELECT A.iboard,D.name, A.title, A.ctnt, C.name, A.created_at createdat,A.board_view boardview FROM board A LEFT JOIN user C ON A.iuser = C.iuser LEFT JOIN board_category D ON A.icategory = D.icategory WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
